Reviews.Title: Good Phone....But Beware!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Skogkatt
Reviews.Content: This phone is good for basic calls. The screen is great, and it has large buttons on the keypad. However, some of the features may not work in the U.S. The Google browser would not work. This is a 3G phone, but it's 3G will not work in the U.S. This phone was made for the Asian market, but it will work with T-Mobile sim cards. You can get downloads (LG PC Suite), but you may have to go to LG's Asian sites. Games, wallpaper, etc., can be found at [...]. As I said, this is a very good phone as long as you accept it's limitations for use in the U.S.

ProductInfo.Features:
Extra large keypad and adjustable font sizes
2.2? TFT, 240x320px, 262K color display
3.5Mpx camera with autofocus
Built in FM Radio and MP3 player
Unlocked Tri-Band 900/1800/1900  GSM/GPRS/ EDGE
ProductInfo.Name: LG KF350 Unlocked GSM Tri-Band Cell Phone with 3MP camera, FM Radio, MP3 Player, and Bluetooth--International Version with No Warranty (Blue)
